Package edu.uci.isr.impromptu.repository

Class Summary
BufferedRequestWrapper Wrap an http request so its input stream can be reused when aggregating from multiple repositories.
CharResponseWrapper CharResponseWrapper wrapps the response of a servlet for a filter Impromptu ProxyFilter uses it to find whether the resource is not available locally and should be fetched from a remote repository Most code is copied from other sources.
Configuration Configuration of Impromptu
Overall  
ProxyFilter ProxyFilter decides where an HTTP request should be handled.
ProxyServlet  
RepositoryPeer RepositoryPeer represents each peer, either the local one or a remote one.
RepositoryUtils Utility methods.
RootServlet This servlet, if used, is to report DAV support at the "/" level of a server
